posts.post_title: T202 Middle Panels FST--13 left--Reduced to $70--
posts.post_content:
I collect T202 middle panels, and the following are some doubles.  
I love the black and white photos, some of which were shot by the famous Conlin, and the text on the back in the jargon of that day.

13 [11 singles + 2 doubles] for [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] $70, delivered.  Cards range from Poor-VG+.   

First come, first served.  First to say he'll take it gets it.

Ppff or pay by check. Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

13 Still available:

Just Before the Battle [McGRAW shaking hands w. A's captain, HARRY DAVIS], $10,
Chase Dives into Third [2], $10 each,
Caught Asleep off First, $7,
Devlin Gets His Man, $7,
Dooin Gets His Man [2], $7 each 
Too Late for Devlin, $7,
Jake Stahl Guarding First, $7,
Ambrose McConnell at Bat, $7,
Moriarity Spiked, $7,
Sweeney Gets Stahl, $7
Donlin Out at First, $5.

Trading:
I still need Held At third [Tannehill/Lord]
I'd buy or trade for this common.

Here are some other BST threads of mine with additional cards in different forums; you can combine any/all:
